Description:
Detects DNS queries made by "AppInstaller.EXE". The AppInstaller is the default handler for the "ms-appinstaller" URI. It attempts to load/install a package from the referenced URL


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: AppX Package Installation Attempts Via AppInstaller.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like 'c:\program files\windowsapps\microsoft.desktopappinstaller_%' and process_path like '%\appinstaller.exe'
